title: Meta Stock, Nvidia, Toyota, Alphabet And 12 Others Enter IBD Watchlists
text:
BREAKING: Core PCE Inflation In Line With Views     IBD stock screens are regularly updated to add new stocks to watch, as well as weed out those that have started to show weakness. In the tables below, you'll see which stocks have been added to or removed from lists like the IBD 50, IBD Sector Leaders and the IBD Big Cap 20. Meta stock, for example, is a new… 3/30/2024
The stock market impressed but Friday's inflation data was sticky. Nvidia peer and AI chip IPO Astera Labs could be... 3/30/2024
The stock market impressed but Friday's inflation data was sticky....
